summary: The Twilight Zone is one of my all-time favorite shows.  I discovered it during one of The Sci-Fi Channel's marathons in the 90s and was blown away by the incredible storytelling.  I loved the twist endings and the way the many of the stories were morality tales, or as creator Rod Serling called it, "wisdom fiction...

summary:
AWS re:Invent 2024
I spent most of the week in Las Vegas for the annual AWS re:Invent conference.  I was there with several work colleagues and I enjoyed spending time with them outside the office.  The conference itself was a whirlwind of activity, and as an introvert being around 60,000 other attendees was a bit overwhelming at times...
